abstract:
The real world examples on how type annotations make your code better
and less complex for other developers.

*Tags:* Infrastructure, Web

Scheduled on `wednesday 17:10 </schedule/#wed-17:10-lounge>`__ in room
lounge
description:
Type annotations still not received that amount of popularity, that
should. People still finding them hard and sometimes ambiguous to use.
But if you start new project in Python in 2018 you should consider using
type annotations in your code and this short talk describes why.

I'll go over examples, where type annotations helped my team to create
less complex code, and how using type annotations changing your mind for
projecting & implementing features for your project.
title: How type annotations make your code better
